cookingTips: Toast walnuts lightly to enhance their nutty flavor and prevent them from becoming soggy
Shred carrots just before serving to maintain crispness and prevent oxidation
Use light mayonnaise to keep the salad from becoming too heavy while still providing creaminess
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple salad relies on quality ingredients and balance. How will you ensure the garlic flavor enhances rather than overpowers the sweet carrots and walnuts?
